mapper.insert: insert into bug (defect_code, defect_name, create_by, assigned_user, project_id, defect_status, defect_type, defect_severity, defect_priority, defect_probability, processing_status, defect_solution, defect_remarks, defect_img, create_time) VALUES(#{defectCode}, #{defectName}, #{createBy}, #{assignedUser}, #{projectId}, #{defectStatus}, #{defectType}, #{defectSeverity}, #{defectPriority}, #{defectProbability}, #{processingStatus}, #{defectSolution}, #{defectRemarks}, #{defectImg}, #{createTime});
mapper.select: select defect_code from bug where defect_code = #{defectCode};
